casebody.data:
VOGLER REYNOLDA ROAD, LLC
v.
SCI NORTH CAROLINA FUNERAL SERVICES, INC. 312A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 10, 2017 Anthony T. Lathrop, Attorney at Law, Glenn E. Ketner, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for SCI North Carolina Funeral Services, Inc. John M. Martin, Attorney at Law, Winterville, Mary V. Cavanagh, Attorney at Law, Winterville, for Vogler Reynolda Road, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File *551Brief filed on the 5th of October 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of October 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 22nd day of November 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
